creator: McClatchy
descriptionHtml:
Connect to The Modesto Bee newspaper’s app wherever you are.

Receive the latest local and breaking news from Modesto and the Central Valley in California. The Modesto Bee report on the local topics you care about, including local weather, traffic, crime, sports and national news.

Features of the app include:

• Breaking news alerts and real-time updates.
• The local news and sports topics you care about from around the Modesto area.
• View stunning photos and galleries of news coverage and events.
• The Modesto Bee opinions, editorials and columns you love.
• Ability to share stories and galleries on Facebook, Twitter or by email.
• EXTRAS: Your subscription to The Modesto Bee app comes with complimentary web access to the Modesto Bee site, as well as access to the eEdition. Subscribe to the app now and get your first month for $1.99. Monthly and annual subscriptions are available for $15.99 per month or $159.99 per year and include unlimited digital access to the The Modesto Bee app, eEdition and Modesto Bee website.


Your subscription will automatically renew each month or year 24-hours before the end of the current period, and your credit card will be charged through your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your Google Play account settings.

Read our Privacy policy here: http://www.modbee.com/site-services/privacy-policy/

Read our Terms of Service here: http://www.modbee.com/site-services/terms-of-service/
descriptionShort: Get the latest local and breaking news from The Modesto Bee.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: • We have fixed some small bugs

• An app-native eEdition of the printed newspaper, including 60 additional pages in the ExtraExtra section.

descriptionShort: Get the latest local and breaking news from The Modesto Bee.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What’s new:
• Your news, your way: Choose between app or eEdition as the default view.
• Customize your Home screen with Topic Selector for a quick glance at the content you care about most.
• eEdition has been rebuilt with improved sharing and easier puzzle printing.
• New look and feel, including new fonts for better legibility.
• Text size can now be adjusted directly in the story page.
• New “My Content” section allows quick access to bookmarks and saved eEditions.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's new:
• Search: You will now be able to perform keyword searches on current content within the app including native articles and eEdition pages
• Performance improvements
• Reading enhancement: The navigation bar at the top of article pages will move out of view when scrolled down, then return when swiping up

Resolved bugs:
• Fixes an issue where a reader couldn’t set the eEdition as the first section tab during initial app setup

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• Overall performance and stability improvements
• For in-app purchase subscribers, added a button that links to the Google Play subscription center for easier payment management.
• Strengthened how the apps handle push notifications by adding in-app browser fallback support.
• The app should no longer send readers to the first page of an eEdition issue when closing an eEdition article view on devices.

title:
The Modesto Bee & ModBee.com
9.3.4

creator: McClatchy
descriptionHtml:
Connect to The Modesto Bee newspaper app wherever you are.

Receive the latest local and breaking news from Modesto and the Central Valley in California. The Modesto Bee reports on the local topics you care about, including local weather, traffic, crime, sports and national news.

Features of the app include:

• View stunning photos and videos of news coverage and events.
• The Modesto Bee opinions, editorials and columns you love.
• Ability to share stories and galleries on Facebook, Twitter or by email.
• Edition, a digital destination for the latest news, features, and insights. Like the printed newspaper, it is intended to be a complete report of the day’s news compiled by our editors overnight.

descriptionShort: Get the latest local and breaking news from The Modesto Bee.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• Fixes an issue where puzzles weren’t displaying in the app and Edition.
• Fixes an issue where the app would freeze when panning and zooming on a replica page in Edition.
• Fixes a display bug with Edition article detail page section labels and author credit lines.
• Fixes an issue some users experienced with login persistence.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This release includes bug fixes and performance enhancements, including:
• Subscriber sign-in improvements: App sign-in has been updated with security and reliability in mind.
• Consistent article text sizing: Your preferred article text size is now saved and applied to subsequent articles for a more consistent reading experience.
• Resolves an issue with the screen zoom feature interfering with Edition.
• Corrects deep linking for Edition classic puzzles and other replica pages.

title:
